# Copilot Instructions

## General Guidelines
- Use GitHub Copilot to assist with code suggestions and implementations.
- Ensure that the code generated aligns with the project's coding standards and practices.

## Code Style
- Follow consistent naming conventions throughout the project.
- Use specific formatting rules for readability and maintainability.
